title: New Year goals and new morning mercies
text:
Another year is in the books and today marks the outset of 2026! The proverbial blank slate is in front of you. Perhaps you’ve established some resolutions, whether a plan for better eating habits, exercise, or discipline in another area which has slipped more than you’d care to admit. Whether you frame these matters as resolutions, goals, disciplines, or preferred practices is of little consequence. A plan to improve your quality of life is worth the effort.
